text: Shambhu Dayal Badgujar was an Indian politician belonged to Bharatiya Janata Party. He was two times member of legislative assembly represented Kekri (Ajmer) constituency. He was chairman of Rajasthan Khadi & Village Industries Board. He died in 2017. == References == Category:2017 deaths Category:Year of birth missing
title: Shambhu Dayal Badgujar
